lead_paragraph: Gov. SEWARD concluded his argument in the Michigan Railroad Conspiracy case on Monday afternoon, and was followed by Mr. Van Dyke. The argument of Gov. Seward was written and, and is understood to be already in the hands of the printer. Gov. SEWARD is one of the most laborious, pains-taking lawyers in the country.
